ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.GpuShaderProgram.Input

    • Uses of GpuShaderProgram.Input in ray.rage.rendersystem.shader

      Subinterfaces of GpuShaderProgram.Input in ray.rage.rendersystem.shader 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  GpuShaderProgram.Attribute<T>
      An input attribute.
      static interface  GpuShaderProgram.LocatableInput<T>
      A nameable input in the source code that is given a location ID at runtime by the underlying driver.
      static interface  GpuShaderProgram.StorageBuffer<T>
      A dynamic storage buffer for input data that receives a buffer ID at runtime by the underlying driver.
      static interface  GpuShaderProgram.Uniform<T>
      An input uniform.
